channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Font Farsi
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Font Farsi

item.title: CVE-2024-1752|2024-04-08T17:28:09.077Z -- Unknown -- Font Farsi
item.description: The Font Farsi WordPress plugin through 1.6.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
